objects.description: 2000- LARGE length for paragraph fields, used for validations and trimming text

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET

objects.description: OBJECT_ARRAY - Returns an array type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
objects.description: SINGLE_OBJECT - Returns a single type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

objects.description: 255 - LONG length for text fields, used for validations and trimming text

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
objects.description: CANCEL.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Cancel" action

objects.description: NEXT.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Next" action

objects.description: SUBMIT.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Submit" action

objects.description: AS CO Internationalization Files

objects.description: Batch size: 1000

objects.description: Ref data id - 57

objects.description: Ref ID: Required - 66

objects.name: AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_SOURCE
objects.description: Value: Source

objects.name: AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_TYPE
objects.description: Value: Type

objects.name: AS_GCM_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
objects.description: Always leave this constant as false, only set to true for automated testing

objects.name: AS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_SAMPLE_Parent
objects.description: Audit config for the AS_ADT_SAMPLE_Parent CDT

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildSimpleFieldChanges
objects.description: Given a list of simple fields from an auditing configuration, an old object, and a new object, returns  list of simple field dictionaries which can be cast to the simple field auditing type of any complex auditing object.

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildSimpleFieldChangesDictionary
objects.description: Given the fieldName, original object, and the new object, determines if a simple field change was made, returning {} if not, and returning a dictionary representation of the simple field audit if so.

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit
objects.description: Primary rule to calculate audits between old and new objects (handles arrays or single objects)

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_MultipleObjects
objects.description: [DO NOT CALL DIRECTLY] Calculates audit CDTs for an array of original and new objects

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_SingleObject
objects.description: [DO NOT CALL DIRECTLY] Calculates audit CDTs for a single of original and new object

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
objects.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters
objects.description: Populated the parameters for starting the audit process

objects.name: AS_CO_CONS_PRIMITIVE_TYPE_ARRAY
objects.description: Array of type numbers of primitive types (1 text, 2 int, 3 dec, 4 boolean, 5 date, 6 datetime, 7 time, 8 user, 9 group, 10 user or group, 11 document, 12 folder)

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
objects.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle
objects.description: Retrieves and then displays a single label from a bundle file -- This is meant to be used in places where you cannot utilize local variables, such as record and site page names

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getUserLocale
objects.description: Gets the Appian user locale as defined in the user preferences, returns the default if the user is null

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
objects.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey
objects.description: Parses a bundle key and returns a dictionary of the `bundleName` & `labelKey`

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument
objects.description: Replaces a single argument symbol with an argument value in a display label

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse
objects.description: Default a null value to false, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue
objects.description: Default a null value to true, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
objects.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_castToDictionary
objects.description: Casts the input to dictionary, either a list or a non-list depending on the input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_castToDictionaryList
objects.description: Casts the input to a dictionary list

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserExists
objects.description: Returns true if the user exists

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserIsActive
objects.description: Returns true if the user is active and exists

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_compare
objects.description: Compares two values and returns true if both the content of the values match (regardless of type).

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_compareStrong
objects.description: Compares two values and returns true if both the values and their types match.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel
objects.description: Retrieves a single label from the Common Objects bundle file

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
objects.description: Returns default required message (used for all editable fields) if required message is not passed.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
objects.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_dynamicDictionary
objects.description: Creates a dictionary based on the provided field-value pairs. An example implementation is provided as a test case. Returns a dictionary.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
objects.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition
objects.description: Returns the standard labelPosition based on the context of the component, allows for custom input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getTypeNamespace
objects.description: Returns the namespace from the type! input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
objects.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank
called_by: AS GCM Create or Update Template

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isRecordTypeData
objects.description: Returns true if the passed data is of type record type

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups
objects.description: Returns true if the user is a member of any of the groups (or condition), uses `loggedInUser()` if `user` input is null

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_left
objects.description: Executes the `left()` function with error handling for a null input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_not
objects.description: Null handles for not -- null returns true (null acts like false)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectCdtByField
objects.description: Removes CDT indices where a match of a single value or list of values in a single field is found, if a list is passed, all matches are rejected

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
objects.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber
objects.description: Returns the array type number from the input type. If type number being passed is already that of a array, returns the same number.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields
objects.description: Returns an array of a CDTs fields. Note that this only works on Appian CDTs, not Dictionary or List of Variant

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
objects.description: Returns the indices of a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnNullDictionary
objects.description: Returns a null dictionary

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnSingleTypeObject
objects.description: Takes in either an array type or a primitive type and returns the singular type object, works for CDTs or primitive types

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnTypeNumber
objects.description: Returns the typeNumber of either `type` or `typeOf`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_simpleGridSelectionSaveInto
objects.description: Given a target updates the target by adding the selected rows and removing the deselected rows.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_toString
objects.description: casts a value to a string with correct handling for integer and decimal formatting

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_triggerRefresh
objects.description: This rule takes in a local variable called local!triggerRefresh and changes the value of it. This is used to refresh a!refreshVariable() in some scenarios.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_typeCompare
objects.description: Returns true if the two input types match

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields
objects.description: Updates one or more fields of a CDT, with an optional input for indices

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs
objects.description: Allows passing field-value pairs to handle for use cases where you have to set newValues as arrays

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains
objects.description: Enhanced wherecontains() which avoids type-casting issues and properly handles for document and group types

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_handler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_primitiveTypeCheckHandler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields`

objects.name: AS_CO_VD_textValidation
objects.description: Performs minimum and maximum length validation on a text value. Returns a validation message if any provided length constraints are violated. Allows for custom validation messages.

objects.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_buildAuditEntityData
objects.description: Rule to build audit data for GAM

objects.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_buildFieldLevelAuditEntityData
objects.description: Calculates the field level entity data to write for GAM

objects.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_constructActionOnlyAuditData
objects.description: Rule to construct action only audit data

objects.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_constructDynamicDictionaryForManipulatedAudit
objects.description: Rule to construct dynamic dictionary for Manipulated audit

objects.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_constructFieldChangesDictionaryForManipulatedAudit
objects.description: Rule to construct dynamic audit dictionary for manipulation audit

objects.name: AS_GAM_ADT_UT_constructManipulatedAuditData
objects.description: Rule to construct Manipulated audit data

objects.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
objects.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

objects.name: AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField
objects.description: Filters CDT or record data by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_GAM_returnCdtOrRecordIndicesByField
objects.description: Returns the Index CDT or record data by matching a single value or list of values in a single field

objects.name: AS_GCM_ADT_BL_auditConfig_Template
objects.description: Audit configuration for `AS_GCM_R_Template`

objects.name: AS_GCM_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField
objects.description: Standard display for a primary record-list field, uses a larger size and strong rich text

objects.name: AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
objects.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_clauseRecordTitle
objects.description: Displays the clause record title

objects.name: AS_GCM_MTR_EXCLUSION_addClauseToRule
objects.description: Application metrics to track the number of time exclusions added to the rule

objects.name: AS_GCM_MTR_EXCLUSION_excludeClauseFromTemplate
objects.description: Application metrics to track the number of time exclusions added to the template

objects.name: AS_GCM_MTR_INCLUSION_addClauseToRule
objects.description: Application metrics to track number of times clauses are added to a rule

objects.name: AS_GCM_MTR_INCLUSION_addClauseToTemplate
objects.description: Application metrics to track the number of clauses added to the template

objects.name: AS_GCM_MTR_SAVE_createTemplate
objects.description: Application metrics to track the template created

objects.name: AS_GCM_MTR_SAVE_editTemplate
objects.description: Application metrics to track the template edited

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_BL_getActionVisibilityToCreateTemplate
objects.description: Returns visibility to create questionnaire

objects.name: AS_GCM_QR_getRefData
objects.description: Returns a list of reference data

objects.name: AS_GCM_QR_getTemplate
objects.description: Returns clause set template details

objects.name: AS_GCM_QR_getTemplateClauseDetails
objects.description: Query Record to get template clause details

objects.name: AS_GCM_QR_getTemplateClauseDetailsWithBatching
objects.description: Query Record to get template clause details with batching

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_captureAuditForRefTemplate
objects.description: The rule constructs the audit data and returns the entity data combination to write to audit DSE for R_template CDT

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType
objects.description: Returns the data after formatting based on return type

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches
objects.description: Returns the Identifiers in batches based on the batchingSize

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_getPrimaryKeyFieldByType
objects.description: Returns PrimaryKey Field based on type

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_nullifyEmptyNestedCdtFields
objects.description: Nulls out the nested cdt fields which are blank

objects.description: Populates the parameters for start audit of `AS_GCM_R_Template`

called_by: AS GCM Create or Update Template

objects.name: AS_GCM_VD_duplicateValidationForTemplateName
objects.description: Validations For Template name

objects.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
objects.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

objects.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
objects.description: The rule returns the hex code when a color name is passed

objects.name: AS_GCM_returnValueBasedOnAutomationToggle
objects.description: Returns the given value if Automation toggle is true.

objects.name: AS_GCM_setMetaDataForTemplateClauseRecord
objects.description: Rule to capture metadata for AS GCM Template Clause

objects.name: AS_GCM_setMetaDataForTemplateRecord
objects.description: Rule to capture metadata for AS GCM R Template

objects.name: AS_GCM_setRecordFields
objects.description: Runs a bulk update on a record object, setting new values for its fields
called_by: AS GCM Create or Update Template

objects.name: AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce
objects.description: This rule calls the fn!substitute in a fn!reduce to replace all the text with the given text. If no input is passed to ri!replaceWith the text will be replaced with empty string

objects.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps
objects.description: Modifies the data by applying the values supplied in modifierMaps

objects.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer
objects.description: Modifies the data by applying the value supplied in modifierMap used in reduce

objects.name: AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField
objects.description:
Generic radio button field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

objects.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
objects.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

objects.name: AS_CO_INP_paragraphField
objects.description: Standard wrapper for a!paragraphField()

objects.name: AS_CO_INP_textField
objects.description: Standard wrapper for a!textField()

objects.description: Milestone component for Create Clause Set

objects.description: Interface for template field details

objects.description: This contains the interface for included and excluded template and rule clauses

objects.description: This contains the grid for Available Clauses / Clause Catalog related to Create or Edit Rule and Template interface

objects.description: This contains the grid for Included and Excluded Clauses in Create /Update Rule interface
